overview: This film tells the story of the mystery of the sadistic murder of sacred people who died tragically (the mystery of skin graft). This incident caught the attention of a producer from Dunia Lain named Sukron (Ronald Surapradja), who then held a Test of Guts in the village. There was chaos during filming, when a gut test participant named Shinta (Dinda Wulansari) disappeared. The local psychic who was presented as caretaker was also found dead.
title: Dunia Lain: The Movie
